SELECT SCHEDULE_ID, OPERATION_TYPE, NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE, TUTORING_NUMBER, SCHEDULE_START, SCHEDULE_END, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(SCHEDULE_START,'%H:%i'),'~',DATE_FORMAT(SCHEDULE_END,'%H:%i')) SCHEDULE_TIME, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(SCHEDULE_START,'%Y년 %m월 %d일'), ' 일정') SCHEDULE_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(SCHEDULE_START,'%Y-%m-%d') SCHEDULE_START_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(SCHEDULE_START,'%H:%i') SCHEDULE_START_TIME, (SELECT NAME FROM PLAY WHERE PLAY.PLAY_ID = SCHEDULE.PLAY_ID) PLAY_NAME, REG_ID, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') REG_DATE, UPD_ID, DATE_FORMAT(UPD_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') UPD_DATE, SUB_TOPIC, NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE - (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION WHERE SCHEDULE_ID = SCHEDULE.SCHEDULE_ID AND TUTORING_YN = 'N' AND STATUS = '02') CLASS_AVA_CNT, TUTORING_NUMBER - (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION WHERE SCHEDULE_ID = SCHEDULE.SCHEDULE_ID AND TUTORING_YN = 'Y' AND STATUS = '02') TUTORING_AVA_CNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION WHERE SCHEDULE_ID = SCHEDULE.SCHEDULE_ID AND TUTORING_YN = 'N' AND STATUS = '02') CLASS_CNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION WHERE SCHEDULE_ID = SCHEDULE.SCHEDULE_ID AND TUTORING_YN = 'Y' AND STATUS = '02') TUTORING_CNT, (SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(STORE_NAME, ' ', - 1) FROM STORE S WHERE S.STORE_ID = SCHEDULE.STORE_ID) STORE_NAME_SHORT FROM SCHEDULE
AND OPERATION_TYPE = 'WEEKDAY'
AND OPERATION_TYPE = 'WEEKEND'
AND STORE_ID = #{storeId}
AND SCHEDULE_START BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{scheduleStart}, '000000'), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AND DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{scheduleStart}, '235959'), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
AND SCHEDULE_START BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H'), '0000'), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AND DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{scheduleStart}, '235959'), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
AND SCHEDULE_END BETWEEN NOW() AND DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{scheduleStart}, '235959'), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
AND SCHEDULE_END BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{scheduleStart}, '000000'), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AND NOW()
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE ( OPERATION_TYPE, NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE, TUTORING_NUMBER, SCHEDULE_START, SCHEDULE_END, PLAY_ID, STORE_ID, SUB_TOPIC, REG_ID, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( #{operationType}, #{numberOfPeople}, #{tutoringNumber}, DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#{scheduleStart}, '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S'), DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#{scheduleStart}, '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S'), INTERVAL #{scheduleEnd} MINUTE), #{playId}, #{storeId}, #{subTopic}, #{regId}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT FORMAT(IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(RESERVATION_ID) FROM RESERVATION A, SCHEDULE B WHERE A.STATUS = '02' AND A.SCHEDULE_ID = B.SCHEDULE_ID AND B.STORE_ID = #{storeId}) , 0), 0) RESERVATION_COUNT, FORMAT(IFNULL((SELECT SUM(NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE) FROM SCHEDULE AND STORE_ID = #{storeId}), 0), 0) TOTAL_COUNT, FORMAT(IFNULL((SELECT SUM(NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE) FROM SCHEDULE WHERE OPERATION_TYPE = 'WEEKDAY' AND STORE_ID = #{storeId}), 0), 0) CLASS_COUNT, FORMAT(IFNULL((SELECT SUM(TUTORING_NUMBER) FROM SCHEDULE WHERE OPERATION_TYPE = 'WEEKDAY' AND STORE_ID = #{storeId}), 0), 0) TUTORING_COUNT
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SCHEDULE A, RESERVATION B WHERE A.SCHEDULE_ID = #{scheduleId} AND A.SCHEDULE_ID = B.SCHEDULE_ID
